content.rendered:
Neitz Unique Technology Made It Possible to Measure the Radius of Curvature in Increments of 0.01 mm

  • The LED light source saves the trouble to replace bulbs
  • The large display improves the visibility of the mearement values
  • The radius of curvature of the contact lens can be measured in increments of 0.01mm

excerpt.rendered: Neitz Unique Technology Made It Possible to Measure the Radius of Curvature in Increments of 0.01 mm
